help.fileBackup.description: A file backup saves all important info of your Peach account & wallet. You can only restore it with the password you created! The seed phrase restores wallet access, so keep it safe too.
help.fileBackup.title: making a backup
help.payoutAddress.description: By default, trade payouts go to your Peach wallet. Enter a custom address here to send them elsewhere.
help.payoutAddress.title: custom payout wallet
help.refundAddress.description: By default, refunds go to your Peach wallet. Enter a custom address here to receive them elsewhere.
help.refundAddress.title: custom refund address
settings.deletePin.success.title: your PIN was deleted
settings.deletePin.success.text: Now you don't need a PIN code to access the Peach App. We do not consider this secure, use at your own risk!
settings.createPin.success.title: your PIN was created
settings.createPin.success.text: The Peach App is secure! Everytime you open the App you will be prompted to enter the PIN. You can modify or delete the PIN on the Settings page.
settings.createPin.insertYourPin: insert your desired PIN code (digits only)
settings.createPin.pinsDontMatch: Error: The PINs didn't match. Try again
settings.changePin.success.title: your PIN was changed
settings.changePin.success.text: You have modified your PIN code. Make sure you don't forget it!
settings.changePin.insertNewPin: The PIN was correct. Insert the new PIN
settings.changePin.pinsDontMatch: Error: The PINs didn't match. Try again
settings.backups.fileBackup.popup2.conte: This password protects your data and funds, so keep it secure.
We do not store this password and cannot recover it!
settings.backups.fileBackup.popup2.title: your password
settings.backups.fileBackup.title: backups
settings.backups.fileBackup.toRestore: to restore your Peach account & wallet
settings.backups.seedPhrase.noDigital: don't store your seed phrase digitally
settings.backups.seedPhrase.noPictures: never take pictures/screenshots of your seed phrase
settings.backups.seedPhrase.popup.text.1: A seed phrase is 12 random words to recover your Peach wallet funds in emergencies.
settings.backups.seedPhrase.popup.text.2: We do not store this seed phrase and cannot recover it!
settings.backups.seedPhrase.popup.title: seed phrase?
settings.backups.seedPhrase.storeSafely: store securely, e.g., in a safe or lockbox
settings.backups.subtitle: backups
settings.bitcoinProducts.proSecurity.des: We use open-source bitbox to secure our Peach funds, and recommend it to you too!
Use code PEACH for a 5% discount.
settings.deleteAccount.deleted.title: bye - bye data
settings.deleteAccount.forRealsies: For realsies. No backup or password = data gone!
settings.deleteAccount.popup: Without your backup AND password, you can't regain access! See https://peachbitcoin.com/privacy-policy for info.
settings.deleteAccount.popup.title: delete account?
settings.deleteAccount.success: We hope to see you back soon!
settings.deleteAccount.success.title: account deleted
settings.deleteAccount.title: All your data will be wiped! Make sure you have a backup.
settings.displayCurrency.subtitle: display currency
settings.escrow.paymentRequest.label: Peach Escrow - offer
settings.escrow.subtitle: escrow
settings.fees.point.1: the bitcoin network fee for the payout
settings.fees.point.2: any fees you pay for using your selected payment method
settings.fees.text.2: of the total amount of the trade.
settings.fees.text.3: This excludes any other fees and markups, which may include:
settings.language.subtitle: display language
settings.missingPermissions.text: Peach needs your permission to use your camera. You can change this in your phone settings.
settings.networkFees.help: These are fees paid to the bitcoin network for refunds or wallet transactions. They vary depending on network activity. Busier network = higher fees for quick confirmation.
settings.networkFees.payoutInfo: This does not apply to payouts. See transaction batching for details.
settings.notifications.popup: Without notifications, you won't be informed of matches. Slow responses hurt your reputation score.
settings.notifications.popup.title: turn off notifications?
settings.paymentMethods.subtitle: payment methods
settings.payoutAddress.popup.content: Do you want to remove this custom wallet?
settings.payoutAddress.popup.title: remove wallet?
settings.payoutAddress.title: set custom address
settings.referrals.customReferralCode.po: Your custom referral code $0 is now active!
Let's get creative! A custom referral code is more fun than just numbers.
settings.referrals.noPeachFees.popup.tex: Activate this to skip Peach fees on your next two trades. Bigger trades = more savings!
settings.refundAddress.title: set custom refund address
settings.seedWords.note.description.1: A seed phrase is 12 random words to recover your Peach wallet funds in emergencies.
settings.seedWords.note.description.2: We do not store this seed phrase and cannot recover it!
settings.socials.subtitle: socials
settings.title: settings
